Name: Tropical Rainforest
Description: Hot and humid year-round with heavy rainfall.

Name: Tropical Monsoon
Description: Heavy seasonal rainfall with a short dry season.

Name: Mediterranean
Description: Hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters.

Name: Mediterranean Warm-Summer
Description: Warm summer with mild winters and dry summer conditions.

Name: Humid Subtropical
Description: Hot summers and mild winters with year-round precipitation.

Name: Oceanic
Description: Mild temperatures year-round with regular rainfall.

Name: Oceanic Warm-Summer
Description: Mild summers and winters with relatively high precipitation.

Name: Humid Continental
Description: Warm summers and cold winters with moderate precipitation.

Name: Humid Continental Warm-Summer
Description: Hot summers with very cold winters and moderate precipitation.

Name: Subarctic
Description: Short, cool summers and long, harsh winters.

Name: Subarctic Cold-Summer
Description: Long, extremely cold winters with short, cool summers.

Name: Tundra
Description: Cold year-round with very short summers and little precipitation.

Name: Ice Cap
Description: Permanently frozen with extremely cold temperatures.

Name: Desert
Description: Very hot, dry areas, usually with very little precipitation.

Name: Steppe
Description: Dry areas with moderate precipitation, often near deserts.

Name: Savanna
Description: Tropical regions with distinct wet and dry seasons.

Name: Tropical Wet and Dry
Description: Hot climate with wet and dry periods.
